info.name: about:home - dark
info.description:
Your (Firefox) home, now made sexy. :3

By far the simplest dark/black about:home userstyle.
info.additionalInfo:
# Changelog

## 2015-04-17
* Adjust the search submit gradient.
* Style the search suggestions table.

## 2014-03-11
* Remove background-image (for Windows).
* Remove the box-shadow on the search inputs (as shown in the Pale Moon screenshot).
